subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Under the cloak of anonymity afforded by the preseason, the Knicks and point guard Chris Duhon have ushered in a freewheeling offense that is a reflection of coach Mike D’Antoni.
snippet: Under the cloak of anonymity afforded by the preseason, the Knicks and point guard Chris Duhon have ushered in a freewheeling offense that is a reflection of coach Mike D’Antoni.
